title: OpenAI cybersecurity grant program
summary: OpenAI has announced the launch of the Cybersecurity Grant Program, a $1 million initiative aimed at enhancing AI-powered cybersecurity capabilities and promoting discussions on AI and cybersecurity. The program aims to empower defenders by ensuring they have access to cutting-edge AI capabilities, develop methods for quantifying the effectiveness of AI models in cybersecurity, and foster rigorous discussions on the challenges and opportunities in this domain. OpenAI is inviting proposals for practical applications of AI in defensive cybersecurity and will grant funding in increments of $10,000 USD. Offensive-security projects will not be considered for funding.
